title: Perma'd: No Email / Tribunal Link
body:
Hello,

I recently got permanently banned for being Toxic. I expected to get an email with a link to the Tribunal decision. When I log in, it shows one game; where I was very toxic. I'd like to see the other games, unless something has changed and you can get punished for a single game (I haven't actually participated in the Tribunal for a few years now).  My gf had broken up with me, and I drank entirely too much vodka that night; but, I'd like to see what I said.

I apparently wasn't as smart as the duo in the one game that shows up when I log in... that is, I don't flame in pre&post lobby and spam pings at people and run to their lane to steal cs to tilt them: Since that wouldn't get me banned because there's no evidence of it on the Tribunal. Additionally, I find it odd that you guys don't do temp bans. I had a chat restriction a few months ago, and then this perma ban. (I think I had a chat restriction over a year ago, as well). tbh had I known I could get perma'd I would have probably played something else, that's less tilting... or made a new account; but I expected I would get a temp ban before getting perma'd.

Cheers.

replies.body:
Riot Games has a zero tolerance policy for  racism/hate speech and it is what lead to a direct perma-ban in your case. That was likely compounded by the multiple 'kys' typed.

> Additionally, I find it odd that you guys don't do temp bans.

The different punishment levels that can be issued are:

10-game chat restriction
25-game chat restriction
14-day ban
perma-ban

If you have questions about your chat log, you can post them on the boards for review.

Thanks for the reply. 

One of the reasons I wanted to see the tribunal is so I can see what that duo typed. From what I can remember, one of them typed kys multiple times after I picked my champ. But, of course, that wouldn't show up in the logs. However, they also said something along the lines of "say it again %%%got" after I typed kys after being spam pinged for 10 mins. So, drunk me typed it two more times.

Each person is responsible for their own actions in game.
What that duo typed would be considered for their respective punishments, not yours.
Yeah, I get that. I would just like to see it, since I don't particularly remember every detail. And related personal reasons related to my mental health.

You want to re-read whatever disgusting chat they wrote?
Yuck X|
I'm very sure they won't give you the full chat logs from the whole game, for the sake of your mental health if anything.  Sounds like a disgusting team chat tbh.
Is a perma-ban an account ban, where you can start over, or a "you can never play league of legends ever again" ban?

More often than not, permanent bans are account bans. Very rarely will Riot issue a ban against a player themselves, but if they do, they generally refer to it as an indefinite ban from League of Legends, meaning they are banned from playing and creating new accounts, but Riot could let them back in if they choose to.
They can go make another one, it will only get banned again though if they continue to act the same way.
Have you considered that your name was a possible reason behind the ban?
pretty sure he meant worstvaynenigeria and didnt have space. if it was the word you're thinking about it would make no sense in that name.

Your reform card presented upon logging into the client may have more games than the email, but it isn't required to have 3; extreme behavior or continuing negative behavior right after another punishment can get you escalated with just one match.

They do give 14 day bans as the [third tier of punishment](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/gameplay-balance/Boqd81O0-upcoming-upgrades-to-chat-restrictions), but your behavior was probably extreme enough to warrant skipping it. This is usually the case with the use of hate speech or making threats.

If you want us to go over the chat logs you already have, you can post it and we'd be happy to. If you want to get more information from Riot you'll want to submit a ticket.

Even if they wrote kys themselves, Riot only punishes based on YOUR behaviour, retaliation, no matter to what, is not an acceptable excuse for them and they will probably get their due punishment too.

Also, tribunal has not existed for I think about 2 years now, permabans are dished out by Riot personally.

Yeah, I didn't know tribunal didn't exist anymore, until this happened and I started looking about. Now I feel like an old%%% for mentioning it :P

I suppose the thing that annoys me the most is that, unless they changed the system when the removed tribunal, the pings dont show up... nor do the pre-post lobbies. Which is unfortunate since you can be amazingly toxic by just using smart pings.

You can get punished for 1 game if you've recently been 14-day banned.

You can jump punishment tiers if your toxicity is over the board.

They show one "recent" game only. If you don't play often it will only show 1 game.
you can get banned for a single game if it was extreme or if you had a 14 day ban before. youÂ´d mind sharing your chatlog with us? it can usually tell a lot
